text:
5
The Committee then went on to determine the contents of
the questionnaire, and agreed that information should be
sought in the following areas: degrees held, memberships in
professional, scholarly and/or research organizations; publica¬
tions; duplicated or unpublished reports; and research in
progress including sponsorship. The Research Committee
Questionnaire (Appendix A) was subsequently designed by
Committee member Bruce Westley and administered by the Wash¬
ington Office of Research and Development of the NAEB, under
the guidance of James Fellows. Compilation of return question¬
naires was the task of the author of this report.
